channel.title: strange race x in half life 1?
channel.description: iv'e thought about omething strange about half ife an opposing force. the new alien race in opposing force is named race x because noone knows what they are and the last boss i opp4ce is race x. but it has a lot of the same textures and colours as the tentacle monster in half life 1. is race x suddenly xen race? or is the tentacles race x??????????????????????????????????????????
